snippet: United States Customs and Border Protection now indicates that Richard W. Matt tried to make a last stand when he was tracked down.
abstract: Federal law enforcement officials offer new details of the shooting of escaped convict Richard W Matt in upstate Malone, NY, by armed federal agents; new information indicates Matt did not simply refuse to put up his hands as reported, but aimed weapon at officer before he was shot multiple times.
lead_paragraph: United States Customs and Border Protection now indicates that Richard W. Matt tried to make a last stand when he was tracked down.

headline.main: Prison Escapee Was Killed After He Aimed Gun at Agent, Officials Say
headline.print_headline: Fugitive Aimed Gun at Agent, Officials Say
